entry.title: What are Custom Product Pages in iOS 15 - The Basics

media:group.media:title: What are Custom Product Pages in iOS 15 - The Basics
media:group.media:description:
Clipped from our WWDC 2021 Recap session, Ariel and Joe discuss impact A/B testing will have on improving marketing in the new App Store in iOS 15
Watch the full Live Appfigures Chat to hear the full recap: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CtoD1ZZkRxY

entry.title: What's new for Subscription Apps in iOS 15?

media:group.media:title: What's new for Subscription Apps in iOS 15?
media:group.media:description:
Clipped from our WWDC 2021 Recap session, Ariel and Joe discuss changes to the tools developers access to in iOS 15 for subscription apps. These include tools for testing, no longer needing a custom back-end, and new APIs that will enable users to cancel subscriptions in-app.
Watch the full Live Appfigures Chat to hear the full recap: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CtoD1ZZkRxY

entry.title: These New App Store Guidelines are Interesting...

media:group.media:title: These New App Store Guidelines are Interesting...
media:group.media:description:
Clipped from our WWDC 2021 Recap session, Ariel and Joe discuss the changes Apple announced to app submission guidelines at WWDC. Security, privacy, scams, and more. It just has Kosta's name all over it!
Watch the full Live Appfigures Chat to hear the full recap: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CtoD1ZZkRxY
Don't know who Kosta the "App Hunter" is? Check out this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M4SB2Ei94cI&t=6s

entry.title: What Can You Do with Custom Product Pages in the New App Store?

media:group.media:title: What Can You Do with Custom Product Pages in the New App Store?
media:group.media:description:
Clipped from our WWDC 2021 Recap session, Ariel and Joe discuss Custom Product Pages in the new App Store in iOS 15. How they work and what developers can do with them.
FYI - They're not for A/B testing.
Watch the full Live Appfigures Chat to hear the full recap: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CtoD1ZZkRxY

entry.title: StoreKit 2 Will Forever Change How Apps Monetize

media:group.media:title: StoreKit 2 Will Forever Change How Apps Monetize
media:group.media:description:
Clipped from our WWDC 2021 Recap session, Ariel and Joe discuss the importance of easy tooling for app developers to switch to subscriptions.

entry.title: AF Chats - WWDC 2021 Recap with Joe Cieplinski

media:group.media:title: AF Chats - WWDC 2021 Recap with Joe Cieplinski
media:group.media:description:
Apple's second virtual World Wide Developer Conference was one of the most interesting events so far! There's a lot of new things to help app businesses grow their downloads, from improvements to subscriptions in StoreKit to A/B tests in App Store Connect and much more.
Join returning guest Joe Cieplinski and our CEO Ariel for a casual chat about everything that's new.

entry.title: AF Chats - Anatomy of an App Store Scam with Kosta Eleftheriou

media:group.media:title: AF Chats - Anatomy of an App Store Scam with Kosta Eleftheriou
media:group.media:description:
Apps that don't do what they're supposed to and force you to pay a hefty subscription, which app hunter Kosta Eleftheriou calls scams, are more prevalent than many app makers and users think.
This month we've invited Kosta, who's been very vocal about identifying those scams and pointing them out to Apple, to talk about his process and motivation.

entry.title: This Week in Apps #64 - TikTok the King Maker

media:group.media:title: This Week in Apps #64 - TikTok the King Maker
media:group.media:description:
This Week in Apps I looked at Paste Keyboard, a niche app that climbed to the top of the App Store, VSCO, which followed suit. I also looked ay the reunion of Friends on HBO Max vs Disney+'s Cruella, Clubhouse for Android, and Etsy's acquisition of Depop.
Like the podcast? Please give us a rating so we feel the ❤️
Links:
* Read online: https://appfigures.com/resources/this-week-in-apps/20210604 * Get App Intelligence: https://appfigures.com/intelligence * The One Where Friends Beats Cruella: https://appfigures.com/resources/insights/hbo-max-friends-disney-cruella

media:group.media:description:

entry.title: Live App Teardown (May. 2021) - Sunbasket and Color Defense

media:group.media:title: Live App Teardown (May. 2021) - Sunbasket and Color Defense
media:group.media:description:
App Store Optimization is an iterative process, but with the right process and tools it doesn't have to be a slow one.
Here's Ariel's method for analyzing competitors to find keyword opportunities.
In this sessions we looked at:
* Sunbasket (App Store) * Color Defense (Google Play)
